data.description:
Step up to the plate with the all new MLB App on Meta Quest. The MLB App is the #1 destination for live baseball video and audio, highlights and much more. Watch and listen live or on demand!

Watch the game like never before with 3D data visualization. Bring every play to life with live pitch data, batter stats and player positions. Follow your favorite players, teams and rivalries like never before with the MLB App for Meta Quest!

**Meta Quest Features**

- **Live MLB Games**: Watch MLB games from the 2023 and 2024 seasons live and On-Demand with Interactive Play-by-Play and 3D data visualization.
- **3D Strike Zone**: Get an inside look into the Strike Zone with live 3D pitch trails.
- **3D Field** View real-time player positions and follow the trajectory of each hit with live ball trails.
- **Immersive Ballpark View:** Watch the game from one of MLB’s 30 Official Ballpark environments.

**Subscribers Get More**

- Access The Official Site of Major League Baseball subscription to watch every out-of-market game.
- Listen to Home, Away and Spanish-language (where available) radio broadcasts live and on demand with MLB At Bat.
- Universal audio support for MLB At Bat subscribers.

Privacy Policy: mlb.com/privacy

Terms of Use: mlb.com/tou

© 2024 MLB Advanced Media, L.P.

changelog.change_log: Fixes issue with Postseason games not appearing on schedule.
Fixed an issue causing postseason games not to appear in the schedule

- Complete redesign and overhaul of the app
- New immersive ballpark experience featuring all 30 MLB ballparks
- More highlights and clips from MLB Network
- Live MLB Network content
- MiLB games of affiliates of your favorite team

MLBVR 1.6 contains significant enhancements across the experience.

Highlights include:

 - Revamped360 Gameday UI, Main Menu UI, and added a 360 content filter to the schedule
 - Fixed “jittery” 360 video issue
 - Many fixes to Gameday experience
 - Several stability and usability improvements
